references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Video Diffusion, the foundation model upon which GenRec is built, providing the strong spatial-temporal priors crucial to GenRec's performance.

references.paper_title: Elucidating the design space of diffusion-based generative models
references.reason: This paper offers fundamental insights into the design and function of diffusion models, providing a theoretical framework crucial to understanding and improving GenRec's generative capabilities.
This work is foundational in demonstrating the power of diffusion models for generative tasks, inspiring the application of similar techniques to video generation and recognition in GenRec.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This is a highly influential paper showcasing the superior performance of diffusion models compared to GANs for image generation, laying the groundwork for the success of diffusion models in video generation tasks within GenRec.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This highly influential paper provides a theoretical framework for score-based generative models that underpins many modern diffusion models, including the ones used in GenRec, offering a crucial theoretical basis for its design.
